### Request for Standing Offer: MAISR KING AIR 350 Training

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for a qualified service provider to provide Hawker Beechcraft King Air 350 simulator training for Canadian Armed Forces members to operate the CE-145 aircraft.

#### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** W6399-23-LK65/B
* **Closing Date:** 14:00 EDT (Eastern Daylight Time) on 2023-03-13
* **Modification Number**: 2
* **Category:** Service (SRV)
* **Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RFSS)
* **Delivery Region:** United States and Canada
* **Languages of Document:** English and French
* **Notice Type:** Competitive - Open bidding

#### Service Requirements

The Department of National Defence is seeking a qualified service provider with resources, instructors, and personnel to support the provision of Hawker Beechcraft King Air 350 simulator training for Canadian Armed Forces members to operate the CE-145 aircraft.

#### Support Documents

supported documents are available on the Canada Buys website at the following links:
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/09/e420981394dc4bfeb0eb20adcb74c5d2/w6399-23-lk65_b_-_amdt_01_question_eng-fra.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/01/5625ff3573ec628d78c285e66d4d2905/rfso_-_w6399-23-lk65_b_-_maisr_training_eng.pdf

#### Questions and Clarification

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided to bidders upon request. Questions and clarifications can be submitted until the closing date.

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation includes trade agreements with several countries including Canada-Chile, Canada-Peru, Canada-Korea, and many more.

#### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of National Defence
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2 Canada
